name: Ever Morning After Watching the World Burn
name_original: Ever Morning After Watching the World Burn
description:
Retro-styled game feat. a typical Californian summer. From the point of view of a small child. Use your browser's back button to get out of "memory breaks". 

Tried to do a cool "memory breaking" thing but it didn't pan out quite as sensical as I'd've liked. I think it's a cool idea to make people "go back" but the execution could have been a lot better. If you have the mental/emotional bandwidth, please let me know how this worked for you!

Music is made from a rusted and untuned Hawaiian Tremoloa. The slider string was missing but the plucking gives it an eerie sound that I truly adore. 

Made for UCSC Alumni Summer Jam #3, theme "inseparable" with twist "nostalgia".
